name: Pop Shop Herbal Tea Blend
summary: Our cola-flavoured Pop Shop Herbal Tea Blend offers a healthy and guilt-free way to relive our childhood memories of sipping on cold cola. Made with natural ingredients, this tea offers the anti-inflammatory properties of cinnamon and licorice root to help boost our immune systems. Suitable for kids from 1 to 101, this tea is an excellent alternative to sugary soft drinks.
